Q_DESC:
In this problem, you have to add and multiply huge numbers! These numbers are so big that you can't contain them in any ordinary data types like a long integer.

Use the power of Java's BigInteger class and solve this problem.

Input Format

There will be two lines containing two numbers aa and bb

Constraints:

 aa and bb are non-negative integers and can have maximum  200200 digits.

Output Format

Output two lines.The first line should contain a+ba+b , and the second line should contain abab .Don't print any leading zeros.
